basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacterium:Listeria monocytogenes EGD (MIC=0.6 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ML-35p (MIC=4 µg/ml), E. coli WBB01 (MIC=0.3 mM), E. coli ATCC 23716 (MIC=0.6 mM), Salmonella enterica R595 (MIC=0.3 mM), S. enterica R60 (MIC=1.25 mM), Proteus mirabilis R45 (MIC=0.6 mM).Yeast:Candida albicans 820 (MIC=20 µg/ml).Human Jurkat T-cells:LD50>40 mM (35.5% lysis at 30 mM).
